topComments.author: Padma Dorjay
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A estrada motorizada mais alta do mundo (19.024 p√©s), mais alta que o acampamento base do Monte Everest.  (Original) World's highest motorable road(19024 feet), Higher than Mt Everest Base camp.

topComments.author: Be Wild
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Umling La passe BRO fez um trabalho final .. Se voc√™ est√° planejando ir para Umling la Coisa para saber Primeiro, Tome o lugar base como Hanley Village (pois esta vila tem todas as facilidades de alimenta√ß√£o e acomoda√ß√£o) Voc√™ pode comprar gasolina tamb√©m nesta vila O custo ser√° de 150/litro Da vila de Hanley, levar√° 3 horas de viagem de ida H√° duas rotas para a vila de Hanley para Umling la Uma √© via Photi La (6¬™ passagem mais alta do mundo e √© mais dif√≠cil que Umling la, a altura de Photi la √© 18124 p√©s) e outra rota √© via Nerbole, caminho comparativamente f√°cil para Umling la..  Umling la road √© totalmente meccardam. E h√° caf√© tamb√©m l√° de passagem. Voc√™ pode ter pequenos lanches e ch√° por l√°.  Permiss√£o necess√°ria t√£o normal quanto para a visita leh.. O √∫ltimo posto de verifica√ß√£o √© em Loma. E nenhuma rede em Hanley e outras regi√µes  (Original) Umling La pass BRO did a ultimate job.. If you are planning to go Umling la Thing's to know First, Take base place as Hanley Village ( as this village has all the facilities of food and accommodation) You can buy petrol also from this village Cost will be 150/litre From Hanley village it will take 3 hour journey one way There is two route to Hanley village to Umling la One is via Photi La ( 6th Highest pass in the world and it is more difficult than Umling la , height of Photi la is 18124 Feet) and another route is via Nerbole comparably easy way to Umling la..  Umling la road is fully meccardam . And there is cafe also there in pass. You can have small snacks and tea over there.  Permission required as normal as for leh visit.. Last check post is in Loma. And no network in Hanley and other regions

topComments.author: Roy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um daqueles lugares que deveriam estar na lista de desejos de um aventureiro. N√£o √© apenas um lugar para se visitar, √© um lugar de orgulho; "a estrada automobil√≠stica mais alta do mundo. BRO faz acontecer e como que para colocar um pouco de humor nisso; eles mant√™m uma cafeteria ao lado de uma sala de oxig√™nio. Venha aqui uma vez e viva o momento.  (Original) One of those places that should be in the bucket list of an adventurer. It's not just a place to visit it's a place of pride; "the highest motorable road in the world. BRO make it happen and as if to put a little humour to it; they maintain a coffee shop alongside a oxygen parlour there. Come here once and live the moment.

topComments.author: Prashant Naidu
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o √© f√°cil constru√≠do pela BRO, obrigado! BRO por fazer essas estradas motorizadas mais altas na √çNDIA e nos convidar a testar nossas habilidades de pilotagem ... chegou ao topo em 23 de abril por uma rota direta que apenas os locais conhecem de Hanle, n√£o via PhotiLa devido √† neve e cobertura de gelo l√°. Os √∫ltimos 5 kms de subida n√£o s√£o f√°ceis... havia vento forte, neve e gelo na estrada e uma subida √≠ngreme em zig zag... note que a altura real do topo foi editada agora...  (Original) Not an easy built by BRO, thank you! BRO for making these highest motorable roads in INDIA and inviting us to test our riding skills...reached the top on 23april via a direct route that only locals know from Hanle, not via PhotiLa due to snow and ice cover there. The last 5 kms climb is not easy...there was strong wind, snow and ice on road and a steep zig zag climb...note that the actual height of the top has been edited now...

topComments.author: Ashwin Manoharan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A estrada motorizada mais alta do mundo, obrigado ex√©rcito indiano e mano  (Original) World highest motorable road , Thank you Indian Army and Bro

topComments.author: Sayuj P R
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Primeira Harley Davidson a chegar a este ponto - 27/06/2022 17:30  Coisas a ter em mente.  1. O n√≠vel de oxig√™nio est√° baixo - carregue um pequeno cilindro de oxig√™nio. O Oxygen Parlor est√° dispon√≠vel assim que voc√™ chegar ao destino.  2. De Hanle por quase 30 km n√£o h√° estrada, voc√™ tem que seguir marcas de pneus e um poste muito pequeno com ZSR nele.  3. Uma vez que voc√™ v√™ o asfalto (estrada), vire √† esquerda, n√£o vire √† direita porque ele o levar√° a um acampamento base do ex√©rcito, que √© uma √°rea restrita.  4. TRANSPORTE COMBUST√çVEL ou Abaste√ßa com combust√≠vel da Hanle - Voc√™ pode comprar combust√≠vel da hanle a um pre√ßo premium.  5. Tente cobrir Hanle at√© Umling la e voltar antes das 17h, chegamos a Umling la por volta das 17h30 e tudo estava fechado e n√£o havia ningu√©m por perto, evite esse risco.  6. As estradas/alfinetes de cabelo s√£o estreitos - seja suave no acelerador  Aproveite o passeio!  (Original) First Harley Davidson to Reach this Point - 27/06/2022 5:30pm  Things to keep in mind.  1. Oxygen Level is low - carry a small oxygen cylinder. Oxygen Parlour is available once you reach the destination.  2. From Hanle for almost 30 kms there is no road, u have to follow tyre tracks and a very small pole with ZSR on it.  3. Once u see the tarmac(road) take left turn, dnt take right turn cos it will take you to an army basecamp which is a restricted area.  4. CARRY FUEL or Fill fuel from Hanle - You can purchase fuel from hanle at a premium price.  5. Try to cover Hanle to Umling la and back before 5 pm, we reached Umling la by 5:30 pm and everything was closed and there was nobody around, avoid that risk.  6. Roads/ Hair pins are narrow - be Gentle on the throttle  Enjoy the ride!

topComments.author: CA K S Harsha
topComments.comment: Every motorcycle guy to Ladakh has to experience this. I shall even take effort to share you hot to reach this. Actually the road from Hanley Gompa starightly shall lead to a Junction that split a road toward Umlingla, but as of now the road is not in a proper state to travel one has to take the road through planes and make efforts in off-roads to reach the Junction. The route is to take a diversion towards Khuldo( it is a home for Indian Astronomical observatory) pass through the village and then you reach a green bride take left and then follow the trail that leads to deboard hills and reach plain land( you will find a fence with Gate made by the locals) it can be opened and remember to close it again. Once you are on the plain land move towards the hills opposite to you on the plain land (approx. 4kms) then you see metal poles that act as Road boundaries (an identification mechanism in planes, they bear markings as ZSR) take your right (towards left will lead to village again but need to cross the river stream) ahed along with the poles they will lead you to Motorable road near 'Ukdungle'. From their make left turn to reach the Junction that split road toward 'Umlingla'. Hurray....!!

topComments.author: Sheethal Jain (Rock n Roll)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta √© uma das melhores e mais altas estradas motorizadas do mundo. Um grande obrigado √† ORGANIZA√á√ÉO DA BORDER ROAD. Eu e meu amigo visitamos aqui em junho de 2022 e tivemos uma maravilhosa experi√™ncia OFF ROADING. Pouqu√≠ssimas pessoas conhecem a rota para este lugar. De alguma forma, conseguimos ir at√© l√°. Fomos de FOTILA PASS e √© totalmente OFF ROADING. No topo, sentimos orgulho de n√≥s mesmos e da nossa moto.  (Original) This is one of the Best and Highest Motorable road on earth. A big thanks to BORDER ROAD ORGANISATION. Me and my friend visited here in Jun-2022 and had a wonderful OFF ROADING experience. Very few people knows route to this place. Somehow we managed to go there. We went from FOTILA PASS and its totally OFF ROADING. At the top we feel proud of ourselves and our bike.

topComments.author: Asif prince04
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A estrada em Umling La Pass, a 19.300 p√©s, assume o t√≠tulo de estrada motorizada mais alta. Ele supera a estrada na¬†Bol√≠via que se conecta ao vulc√£o Uturuncu, a uma altitude de 18.953 p√©s. Enquanto isso, o Khardung La Pass em Leh, que anteriormente era considerado a estrada motorizada mais alta, est√° a uma altitude de 17.582 p√©s.  (Original) The road at Umling La Pass, at 19,300ft, takes over the title of the highest motorable road. It trumps the road in¬†Bolivia which connects to the Uturuncu volcano, at an altitude of 18,953 ft. Meanwhile, the Khardung La Pass in Leh, which was earlier said to be the highest motorable road, is at an altitude of 17,582 ft.

topComments.author: Lokender Pilaniya
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Estive aqui em 4 de outubro de 2021 Passamos mais de uma hora aqui ap√≥s o p√¥r do sol at√© as 21h.  De Hanle, peguei a rota de passagem de Photi La - Chishumle - Umling La - Demchok e depois voltei para Umling La para algumas fotos noturnas.  Fiquei em uma pequena casa de fam√≠lia em Kyul. No dia seguinte, peguei a rota do passe de Nurbu La para chegar a Hanle.  Compartilhando algumas fotos que tirei aqui.  (Original) I was here on 4th Oct 2021 Spent more than an hour here after sunset till 9pm.  From Hanle I took the Photi La pass route - Chishumle - Umling La - Demchok and then back to Umling La for some night shots.  Stayed at a small homestay in Kyul. Next day I took the Nurbu La pass route to reach Hanle.  Sharing some photos I shot here.

topComments.author: Beetvlog Soloway
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Leh- Hemis mosteiro- Kharu (√∫ltima bomba de gasolina, carregue combust√≠vel m√≠nimo de 20 litros e tanque cheio de combust√≠vel na bicicleta) -Hanley- ZSR- Umling La  (Original) Leh- Hemis monastery- Kharu(last Petrol Pumb, carry minimum 20 ltr fuel and full tank fuel in bike) -Hanley- ZSR- Umling La

topComments.author: Bunny Punia
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Orgulhosamente escalou o passe ontem (29 de mar√ßo). Pegamos uma 'nova' rota que contornava a passagem de Photi la. Portanto, o total de km de Hanle para n√≥s foi de cerca de 65 km. A √∫ltima subida de 20 km √≠mpares √© asfaltada e boa. Voc√™ ver√° raposas e coelhos selvagens nesta rota. Em mar√ßo, n√£o encontramos um √∫nico ve√≠culo. Ventos super gelados e super r√°pidos. Sub zero, mas o sol forte garante que a estrada esteja livre de gelo e neve. Parab√©ns ao BRO e ao Ex√©rcito Indiano. Anexando algumas fotos.  Coelhinho da 91Wheels  (Original) Proudly scaled the pass yesterday (29 March). We took a 'new' route that bypassed Photi la pass. So total km from Hanle for us was about 65km. The last climb of 20 odd km is tarmac and good. You will see wild foxes and rabbits on this route. In March, we did not come across a single vehicle. Super icy and super fast winds. Sub zero but strong sun ensures road is free of ice and snow. Hats off to BRO and the Indian Army. Attaching a few pictures.  Bunny from 91Wheels

topComments.author: Traveller Niladri
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â a estrada com motoriza√ß√£o mais alta do "W O R l D" e a palavra em si √© a maior de todos os tempos. Portanto, devemos estar orgulhosos disso. Obrigado ao BRO e ao Ex√©rcito Indiano que o fez. Aqui est√£o algumas fotos  (Original) It's the highest motorable Road in the "W O R l D" the word itself is the biggest ever. So we should be proud of it.Thanks to BRO and Indian Army who made it. Here are some pictures

topComments.author: Daljit singh khurl
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A BRO construiu a estrada na passagem de Umling La em 2021. Est√° situado a uma altitude de 19.024 p√©s. Liga a aldeia de Chisumle e a aldeia de Demchok. Esta √© a estrada mais alta do mundo. Por esta raz√£o, Umling La Pass foi registrado no Guinness World Records. √â extremamente desafiador construir estradas em tal altura. Aqui a temperatura cai para -40 graus Celsius. Al√©m disso, os n√≠veis de oxig√™nio est√£o 50% abaixo do normal nessas altitudes. Com esse tempo n√£o √© f√°cil conseguir a estrada constru√≠da pelos trabalhadores contratados. topComments.author: TheLifeOfKarthik
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fizemos uma viagem de bicicleta ladakh e exatamente no dia 1 de outubro de 2021 alcan√ßamos a maior passagem motorizada do mundo umling la e foi realmente um momento surreal para n√≥s. Mais informa√ß√µes e v√≠deos sobre nossa viagem ladakh e umlingla podem ser encontrados em meu canal no youtube "thelifeofkarthik"  (Original) We did a ladakh bike trip and exactly on October 1 2021 we reached world's highest motorable pass umling la and it was really a surreal moment for us.
